name: add
desc: Add two values together

name: subtract
desc: Subtract first number from the second number

name: multiply
desc: Multiply first number by the second number

name: divide
desc: Divide the first number by the second number

name: increment
desc: Add 1 to a number

name: decrement
desc: Subtract 1 from a number

name: multiplyDecimals
desc: Multiply first decimal by second decimal

name: divideDecimals
desc: Divide first decimal by second decimal

name: concatenate
desc: Add one string to another string

name: concatenatePlusEquals
desc: Add a string to an existing string

name: stringVariables
desc: Insert one or more variables into a string

name: stringLength
desc: Find length of a string value

name: firstCharacter
desc: Find the first character in a string

name: nthCharacter
desc: Find the nth character in a string

name: findLastCharacter
desc: Find the last character in a string

name: nthToLastCharacter
desc: Find the nth to last character in a string

name: arrayPush
desc: Adds a value to the end of an array

name: arrayPop
desc: Removes a vaule off the end of an array

name: arrayShift
desc: Removes a vaule from the beginning of an array

name: arrayUnshift
desc: Removes a vaule from the beginning of an array

name: shoppingList
desc: Create a shopping list

name: nextInLine
desc: Takes an array and a number as arguments (Stand in line)

name: countingCards
desc: Counting cards : Bet or Hold

name: profileLookup
desc: Function checks to see if name and property are actual name and property of that contact

name: randomNum
desc: Generates random whole number within a range

name: removeSplice
desc: Remove any number of consecutive elements from anywhere in an array

name: addSplice
desc: Add with splice to an array

name: indexOf
desc: Checks for the presence of an element on an array

name: typeofVar
desc: To check the data structure, or type, of a variable

name: filterMethod
desc: creates a new array with all the elements that pass the test implemented

name: sliceArr
desc: returns the selected elements in an array, as a new array

name: sliceNotSplice
desc: returns the selected elements in an array, as a new array

name: concatArr
desc: merges two or more arrays together

name: concatNotPush
desc: merges two or more arrays together

name: reduceMethod
desc: iterates over each item in an array and returns a single value

name: higherOrder
desc: uses filter and map methods

name: sortArr
desc: sorts the elements of an array in place and returns the sorted array

name: returnSortedArr
desc: return a new array that is sorted not affecting origianl array

name: splitArr
desc: splits a string into an array of strings

name: joinMethod
desc: joins the elements of an array together to create a string

name: stringToSlug
desc: convert a string to url slug

name: everyMethod
desc: tests whether all elements in the array pass the test implemented by the function

name: someMethod
desc: tests whether at least one of the elements in the array passes the test implemented by the function

name: celsiusToFahrenheit
desc: converts celsius to fahrenheit

name: reverseMethod
desc: reverses an array in place. first becomes last, last becomes first

name: factorializeNum
desc: product of an integer & all integers below it

name: longestWord
desc: finds the length of longest word in sentence

name: largestNumArr
desc: finds largest number in a array

name: confirmEnding
desc: checks if a string ends with a given target string

name: repeatString
desc: repeats a string (first arg) for num times (second arg)

name: truncateStr
desc: shortens a string if it is longer than the specificed number of character

name: findersKeepers
desc: uses a function that looks through an array and returns the first element in the array that passes true

name: booWho
desc: check if value is classified as a boolean primative

name: capTitle
desc: capitalize first letter of each word in title

name: sliceNSplice
desc: copy element of the first array into the second array in order

name: byeFalsy
desc: removes all falsy values from array

name: whereDoIBelong
desc: return the lowest index at which a value (second arg) should be inserted into an array (first arg) once its been sorted

name: mutation
desc: Returns true if the string in the first element of the array contains all of the letters of the string in the second element of the array

name: chunkyMonkey
desc: split array (first arg) into groups the length of size (second arg) and return as two-dimensional array
